years.theme_description:
It's the end, it's the beginning.
It's all and it's nothing.
It's everywhere and it's Nowhere.
Is 2012 the end of the world or the start of a new era?
Is it Armageddon or a renaissance?

Out with the old, in with the new
The post-2012 age is soon upon us.
And it all ends and begins in the desert.
